title: Rclone fails to make cache dir if file/folder name has illegal characters on Windows
body:
<!--

We understand you are having a problem with rclone; we want to help you with that!

**STOP and READ**
**YOUR POST WILL BE REMOVED IF IT IS LOW QUALITY**:
Please show the effort you've put in to solving the problem and please be specific.
People are volunteering their time to help! Low effort posts are not likely to get good answers!

If you think you might have found a bug, try to replicate it with the latest beta (or stable).
The update instructions are available at https://rclone.org/commands/rclone_selfupdate/

If you can still replicate it or just got a question then please use the rclone forum:

    https://forum.rclone.org/

for a quick response instead of filing an issue on this repo.

If nothing else helps, then please fill in the info below which helps us help you.

**DO NOT REDACT** any information except passwords/keys/personal info.

You should use 3 backticks to begin and end your paste to make it readable.

Make sure to include a log obtained with '-vv'.

You can also use '-vv --log-file bug.log' and a service such as https://pastebin.com or https://gist.github.com/

Thank you

The Rclone Developers

-->

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

With a mounted remote if said remote has an illegal character in any of it's filenames rclone will fail in creating the cache dir. In my case the parent directories (parent for the mount) have the character `:` in their names which in Windows is illegal. This should be easy to reproduce, just name a folder with one of those illegal characters, mount it on Windows and try to open a file.

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

1.55.1

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (e.g. Windows 7, 64 bit)

Windows 10, x64

#### Which cloud storage system are you using? (e.g. Google Drive)

Google Drive

#### The command you were trying to run (e.g. `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

`rclone mount Crypt_Remote:REDACTED U: --read-only --volname Folder --vfs-cache-mode full --network-mode`

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (e.g. output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

```
2021/05/25 23:47:35 ERROR : HDD (Y:)/quarentine/file.jpg: vfs cache: failed to remove cache file as failed to stat cache file: CreateFile \\?\C:\Users\1024mb\AppData\Local\rclone\vfs\Crypt_Remote\REDACTED\HDD (Y:)\quarentine\file.jpg: El nombre de archivo, el nombre de directorio o la sintaxis de la etiqueta del volumen no son correctos.: remove \\?\C:\Users\1024mb\AppData\Local\rclone\vfs\Crypt_Remote\REDACTED\HDD (Y:)\quarentine\file.jpg: El nombre de archivo, el nombre de directorio o la sintaxis de la etiqueta del volumen no son correctos.
2021/05/25 23:47:35 ERROR : HDD (Y:)/quarentine/file.jpg: vfs cache: failed to remove metadata from cache as failed to stat cache file: CreateFile \\?\C:\Users\1024mb\AppData\Local\rclone\vfs\Crypt_Remote\REDACTED\HDD (Y:)\quarentine\file.jpg: El nombre de archivo, el nombre de directorio o la sintaxis de la etiqueta del volumen no son correctos.: remove \\?\C:\Users\1024mb\AppData\Local\rclone\vfsMeta\Crypt_Remote\REDACTED\HDD (Y:)\quarentine\file.jpg: El nombre de archivo, el nombre de directorio o la sintaxis de la etiqueta del volumen no son correctos.
2021/05/25 23:47:35 ERROR : HDD (Y:)/quarentine/file.jpg: vfs cache: failed to remove cache file as failed to load metadata: vfs cache item: failed to read metadata: open \\?\C:\Users\1024mb\AppData\Local\rclone\vfsMeta\Crypt_Remote\REDACTED\HDD (Y:)\quarentine\file.jpg: El nombre de archivo, el nombre de directorio o la sintaxis de la etiqueta del volumen no son correctos.: remove \\?\C:\Users\1024mb\AppData\Local\rclone\vfs\Crypt_Remote\REDACTED\HDD (Y:)\quarentine\file.jpg: El nombre de archivo, el nombre de directorio o la sintaxis de la etiqueta del volumen no son correctos.
2021/05/25 23:47:35 ERROR : HDD (Y:)/quarentine/file.jpg: vfs cache: failed to remove metadata from cache as failed to load metadata: vfs cache item: failed to read metadata: open \\?\C:\Users\1024mb\AppData\Local\rclone\vfsMeta\Crypt_Remote\REDACTED\HDD (Y:)\quarentine\file.jpg: El nombre de archivo, el nombre de directorio o la sintaxis de la etiqueta del volumen no son correctos.: remove \\?\C:\Users\1024mb\AppData\Local\rclone\vfsMeta\Crypt_Remote\REDACTED\HDD (Y:)\quarentine\file.jpg: El nombre de archivo, el nombre de directorio o la sintaxis de la etiqueta del volumen no son correctos.
2021/05/25 23:47:35 ERROR : HDD (Y:)/quarentine/file.jpg: vfs cache: failed to open item: vfs cache item: open mkdir failed: make cache REDACTED failed: mkdir \\?\C:\Users\1024mb\AppData\Local\rclone\vfs\Crypt_Remote\REDACTED\HDD (Y:): El nombre del directorio no es v√°lido.
2021/05/25 23:47:35 ERROR : HDD (Y:)/quarentine/file.jpg: Non-out-of-space error encountered during open
2021/05/25 23:47:35 ERROR : IO error: open RW handle failed to open cache file: vfs cache item: open mkdir failed: make cache REDACTED failed: mkdir \\?\C:\Users\1024mb\AppData\Local\rclone\vfs\Crypt_Remote\REDACTED\HDD (Y:): El nombre del directorio no es v√°lido.
```
